clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Placenta is isoechoic and normally located.
Urinary bladder is hyperechoic, no intraluminal lesions.
Right kidney demonstrates well-defined, no hydronephrosis.
Gallbladder shows smooth-walled, no stones or wall thickening.
Soft tissue region demonstrates isoechoic without fluid collection.
Testes are normal with normal vascularity.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
